description: Erection of a rear extension at second floor level, over part of the existing back addition; erection of a replacement single storey side extension; demolition of the existing two storey external store to the rear elevation at ground and first floor level; installation of 2no. rooflights, on top of the main flat roof at roof level; installation of a rooflight in the sloped roof behind front gable wall; installation of an air conditioning unit, on top of the flat roof of proposed second floor rear extension; installation of new French doors with a Juliette balcony following the removal of existing window, to the rear elevation of existing rear roof extension; installation of a rooflight on top of the pitched roof, and installation of new French doors including side windows and a Juliette balcony following the removal of an existing window to the rear elevation of first floor back addition; installation of new bi-folding doors following the removal of existing French doors and side window, to the rear elevation at ground floor level; erection of a bin store in the front garden; further excavation of the front garden (under the footpath) and alterations to the existing front lightwell to include, installation of a new enlarged French doors with sidelights following the removal of existing to the front elevation, and replacement of a single door with a new sash window to the side elevation, and excavation of part of the rear garden to form a lightwell with a walk-on glass rooflight above, in connection with the lowering and enlargement of existing basement.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
